params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

QueryParamsResponse.title: Query Params Response
QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

bid_timeout.description: bid_timeout defines the duration after which a bid can be claimed by the bidder

allowed_denoms.description: allowed_denoms defines the denominations that are allowed to be used for valuations and bids

reject_bid_valuation_fee_percent.description: reject_bid_valuation_fee_percent defines the percentage of the new valuation to charge as a fee when rejecting a bid

minimum_bid_percent_increase.description: minimum_bid_percent_increase defines the minimum percentage increase required for a new bid compared to the previous bid

dysonprotocol.nameservice.v1.Params.title: Params
dysonprotocol.nameservice.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the nameservice module.
